alert.note: Alert for Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 6:21PM CDT until May 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dale County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Daleville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Ozark, Fort Rucker, Newton, Pinckard, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dean Church Road, Knox Field, Bagwells Crossroads, Kelly, Ewell, Blackwell Field A/p, Hanchey Field and Klondyke Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
